text: We had a customer that wanted to render and create 3D animations and effects for TV shows.
With that came compute requirements. With the data they were generating, they had large storage requirements.
They knew they had to break the mold and finding talent, regardless of their location.
Technology and infrastructure was also incredibly important to them.
They worked with AWS to find processing and rendering capabilities that suited their workflow.
The ability to press a button to provision infrastructure is a game changer for them.
Working with AWS, they use the elastic compute cloud.
And using our GPU instances such as the G5,
they were able to use graphic-intensive applications in the cloud.
To handle their storage requirements they utilized Amazon S3 to handle high throughput with their large data sets.
With a fully-automated platform, the animators and visual effects artists could spin up works stations in under two minutes.
Traditionally, these media studios would take months to get up and running. In this particular instance, they took six weeks.

This particular customer scaled from six employees
to over 100 in under 13 months.

With AWS as a partner, this enabled them to grow. 
Customers realize value in their investment almost immediately.
The fact that they can get onto the AWS cloud, they can start spinning up work stations,
they can collaborate remotely, they can build out their platform very, very quickly on AWS.
Small and medium-sized businesses don't have the resources that some of the larger enterprises have.
They need the ability to scale and the flexibility to provision their IT resources on demand.
Small and medium-sized businesses need cost effective solutions, where they can build out their businesses quickly and reliably.

AWS provides a broad set of services
to help you integrate with the cloud.
We can provide AWS training to help you with your migration. We have partners that can assist you along the way.
